name: ecommerce-d-choco-front
description: Frontend da loja D'Choco - Chocolates Artesanais

scripts.purge-css: purgecss --css assets/css/main.css assets/css/icone.css assets/css/carrinho.css assets/css/mobile-nav.css assets/css/slider.css assets/css/pwa.css --content '*.html' 'assets/**/*.js' --output assets/css/ --safelist '.fa-,^icon,^is-,^has-,^with-,mobile-bottom-nav,desktop-bottom-nav,active,show,hidden,pwa-install-prompt,pwa-install-content,pwa-install-buttons,offline-indicator,pwa-loading'
scripts.optimize: npm run purge-css && npm run minify-css

author: Diego Moraes
